learning_objective: Seek diverse perspectives for the purpose of improving computational artifacts.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Jamal is developing a digital artifact for a history project on ancient civilizations. He has coded a series of interactive timelines that compare technological advancements across different societies. To improve his program based on diverse perspectives, what types of feedback should he seek?",
    "Answer1": "Ask his science teacher for feedback on the accuracy of the technological advancements listed",
    "Answer2": "Request feedback from his classmates on the usability and interactivity of the timelines",
    "Answer3": "Ask a history teacher of another culture's ancient civilization to provide information that could be included in the timeline",
    "Answer4": "All of the above",
    "CorrectAnswer": "4",
    "Explanation": "Seeking diverse perspectives helps refine the program and makes it more accurate, informative, and usable. Input from experts ensures accurate content, while feedback from users can highlight usability and interactivity issues. A history teacher from a different culture can provide fresh insights and information.",
    "code_snippet": "action CreateTimeline(string civilization)\n    // code to create timeline for the provided civilization\nend\n\nCreateTimeline(\"Sumerians\")\nCreateTimeline(\"Ancient Chinese\")\nCreateTimeline(\"Indus Valley\")\nCreateTimeline(\"Ancient Egyptians\")"
}
